ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 332
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, we can only hope that Verant will have a use for once SoV will be released as Yak(?) (Verant Skill Guy) has confirmed that it currently has no use.  I m
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, we can only hope that Verant will have a use for once SoV will be
released as Yak(?) (Verant Skill Guy) has confirmed that it currently has
no use. I'm assuming the same is for the catapult.

QdP
52 Gnomish Magi
Ilsik Haucil
Mith Marr

"Quasinom de Plume is my quasi nom-de-plume"

>
> Piip Ignatz
